title: Online Writing Proficiency Development Program through Visual Image Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic writing structures and elementary to secondary English reading comprehension
context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning environments using digital devices, linked to social studies curricula for office/administrative professionals

learning_goals: Learners develop the ability to analyze visual images (infographics, charts, etc.) in online environments to derive logical structures and convert them into writing materials
Learners improve their draft writing by at least 30% based on 4-stage feedback (lexical diversity, content coherence, grammatical accuracy, and visual element integration).
Learners provide and receive feedback through a peer assessment system, then incorporate the comments to finalize their manuscripts.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
